commands.stucktogether.team.info.title: My Sphere Team:
commands.stucktogether.team.create.succe: You have created a sphere team successfully.
commands.stucktogether.team.create.alrea: You cannot create a new sphere team while you are already in one.
commands.stucktogether.team.add.success: %1$s was added to the sphere team successfully.
commands.stucktogether.team.add.success_: You were added to %1$s's sphere team.
commands.stucktogether.team.add.no_team: You are not in a sphere team.
commands.stucktogether.team.add.not_lead: Only the leader can add members to the sphere team.
commands.stucktogether.team.add.already_: %1$s is already in a sphere team.
commands.stucktogether.team.kick.success: %1$s was kicked from the sphere team successfully.
You were kicked from %1$s's sphere team.
commands.stucktogether.team.kick.no_team: You are not in a sphere team.
commands.stucktogether.team.kick.not_lea: Only the leader can kick members from sphere team.
commands.stucktogether.team.kick.not_in_: %1$s is not in the sphere team.
commands.stucktogether.team.kick.leader_: Leader cannot kick self from sphere team.
commands.stucktogether.team.disband.succ: Your sphere team has been disbanded successfully.
commands.stucktogether.team.disband.no_t: You are not in a sphere team.
commands.stucktogether.team.disband.not_: Only the leader can disband the sphere team.
commands.stucktogether.team.leave.succes: You left the sphere team successfully.
commands.stucktogether.team.leave.leader: You cannot leave the sphere team as leader. Try disbanding.
commands.stucktogether.team.leave.not_in: You are not in a sphere team.
